name: starting_to_drive_branching
description: Branching world with multiple paths and endings

states.description: Driver sitting in parked car from first-person perspective, both hands resting on lap not touching steering wheel, seatbelt hanging loose and unbuckled on left side with no strap across chest, dashboard completely DARK with all indicator lights OFF and instruments unlit, parking brake lever in UP engaged position clearly visible between seats, key in OFF position in ignition, windshield showing stationary parking lot view with parked cars visible, steering wheel untouched and centered in lower view, gear indicator showing P for Park.

Driver from first-person perspective, right hand reaching up to adjust rearview mirror, left hand still resting on lap, seatbelt hanging loose, dashboard still dark, parking brake lever up, engine off, stationary parking lot view.

Driver in parked car, both hands resting on lap, seatbelt hanging loose and unbuckled, dashboard still completely DARK with all indicator lights OFF, parking brake lever in UP engaged position, engine still off with key in OFF position, windshield still showing stationary parking lot view, steering wheel untouched and centered, gear indicator P.

Driver from first-person view, both hands returning to rest on lap, seatbelt now BUCKLED with strap clearly visible as diagonal line across chest from left shoulder to right hip with metal buckle secured on right side, dashboard still completely DARK with no lights illuminated, parking brake lever still in UP engaged position, engine still off with key in OFF position, windshield still showing stationary parking lot view, steering wheel untouched.

Driver in parked car from first-person view, right hand now on ignition key/button, left hand resting on lap, seatbelt buckled across chest, dashboard now BRIGHTLY LIT with multiple colored indicator lights glowing (red check engine light, yellow battery warning, green ready indicator, blue high beam indicator), speedometer illuminated showing 0 mph, gear indicator display lit showing P, parking brake lever still in UP position, engine now running (audible idle), windshield still showing parking lot view.

Driver in parked car, right hand now released from ignition, left hand resting on lap, seatbelt buckled, dashboard illuminated with various indicator lights ON, speedometer 0 mph, gear indicator P, parking brake lever still UP, engine running, windshield view of parking lot.

Driver in parked car from first-person perspective, right hand moving to gear shift, left hand on steering wheel, seatbelt buckled, dashboard illuminated, speedometer 0 mph, gear indicator now showing D, parking brake lever still in UP position, engine running, windshield view of parking lot, hands on wheel ready for action.

Driver in car, left hand gripping steering wheel at 9 and 3 o'clock positions, right hand released from gear shift and now on steering wheel, seatbelt buckled, dashboard illuminated, speedometer reading 15 mph, gear indicator D, parking brake lever is in DOWN position, engine running, windshield view now shows moving road view, car is moving safely on the road.
The seatbelt is buckled, but twisted and uncomfortable. The driver glances down to check the buckle.

The car smoothly accelerates, maintaining a safe distance from other vehicles. The driver expertly steers, following the lane markings perfectly. The speedometer reads 30 mph, the engine hums quietly, and the road ahead is clear and open. The driver maintains focus and awareness of the surroundings.

metadata.reason: The driver successfully executed all steps, demonstrating excellent control and awareness, and achieving all goal state elements with perfection.

states.description: The car lurches forward erratically as the driver over-accelerates, swerving slightly and nearly colliding with another vehicle. The driver slams on the brakes, and the car stalls. The car is now stalled in the road. Another driver shouts at them.

metadata.reason: The driver made a critical error in acceleration or steering, leading to a dangerous situation and failure to meet the goal state; now blocking road.

states.description: The engine starts and idles smoothly. The dashboard illuminates, displaying the speedometer and other gauges. The parking brake light is still illuminated. The car is still stationary.

The car initially bucks forward, screeching its tires. The driver immediately releases the parking brake. The car accelerates hesitantly, the driver gripping the steering wheel tightly, and the speedometer now reads 10 mph. The driver is noticeably tense.

actions.description: Driver reaches up with right hand to adjust rearview mirror, moves it slightly, releases hand, then returns right hand to lap.

Driver grasps seatbelt buckle with left hand from left side of seat, pulls seatbelt strap diagonally across chest from left shoulder toward right hip, guides metal buckle with right hand into receiver on right side of seat, pushes buckle in with audible click, releases both hands - seatbelt strap now secured and clearly visible as diagonal black strap across torso.

Driver grasps seatbelt buckle with left hand from left side of seat, pulls seatbelt strap diagonally across chest from left shoulder toward right hip, guides metal buckle with right hand into receiver on right side of seat, pushes buckle in with audible click, releases both hands - seatbelt strap now secured and clearly visible as diagonal black strap across torso.
Driver's right hand moves to and turns ignition key, engine makes starting sound, dashboard lights turn ON, multiple colored indicators now glowing.
Driver releases ignition key, right hand returns to lap, dashboard lights remain ON.
Driver's right hand moves to and shifts gear shift to D (Drive) position.

Driver's right foot depresses accelerator, left hand grips steering wheel at 9 and 3 o'clock, right hand moves from gear shift to steering wheel, and then right foot releases parking brake (audible click) and car begins to move forward.
Driver quickly reaches for the seatbelt buckle with their right hand, attempting to pull it across their body and jam it into the receiver without properly adjusting or guiding the strap.
The driver, realizing the seatbelt is twisted, adjusts the strap and pulls it taut, then presses the gas pedal and releases the parking brake.

Driver quickly reaches across body with right hand and pulls the seatbelt strap diagonally across the chest, directly inserting the buckle into the receiver without fully adjusting the strap or ensuring a secure fit; releasing the hands.
Driver attempts to start the engine by rapidly turning the key multiple times in quick succession, hoping to overcome a potential starting issue.
Driver quickly glances at the dashboard, then presses the gas pedal slightly while simultaneously turning the ignition key. This attempts to start the engine and skip the initial dashboard check.
Driver quickly glances at side mirror, slams foot on accelerator, ignoring the parking brake; the car lunges forward with a screech.

end_state.description: The engine sputters, struggles to start, and then unexpectedly roars to life with a powerful surge. The car lurches forward with a jerk as the driver, surprised by the aggressive start, over-accelerates and the steering wheel veers slightly to the right. The car swerves erratically, narrowly avoiding a parked car and heading towards another vehicle. The driver panics and slams on the brakes.

initial_state.description: Driver sitting in parked car from first-person perspective, both hands resting on lap not touching steering wheel, seatbelt hanging loose and unbuckled on left side with no strap across chest, dashboard completely DARK with all indicator lights OFF and instruments unlit, parking brake lever in UP engaged position clearly visible between seats, key in OFF position in ignition, windshield showing stationary parking lot view with parked cars visible, steering wheel untouched and centered in lower view, gear indicator showing P for Park.

goal_states.description: The car smoothly accelerates, maintaining a safe distance from other vehicles. The driver expertly steers, following the lane markings perfectly. The speedometer reads 30 mph, the engine hums quietly, and the road ahead is clear and open. The driver maintains focus and awareness of the surroundings.

metadata.reason: The driver successfully executed all steps, demonstrating excellent control and awareness, and achieving all goal state elements with perfection.

goal_states.description: The car accelerates, but the lane position wavers slightly. The driver corrects the steering to stay within the lane. The speedometer reaches 25 mph. The car merges safely with moderate traffic. The driver demonstrates good situational awareness, although occasional glances are needed to verify blind spots.

metadata.reason: The driver achieved the goal state but with minor imperfections in lane keeping and speed control, demonstrating slightly imperfect execution.

goal_states.description: The car accelerates slowly. The driver keeps the car in the lane, but the steering is hesitant. The speedometer reaches 18 mph. The driver is noticeably tense but manages to maintain control. Other cars pass. The driver successfully navigated the initial driving steps, but with obvious signs of being a novice.

metadata.reason: The driver achieved the goal state, but with slow progress and some shakiness, and with some difficulty and slow reaction times.

final_states.description: The driver hesitates, panics, and pulls over to the side of the road, putting the car in park and switching off the engine. The driver is visibly shaken and decides that driving is too stressful.

metadata.reason: The driver did not achieve the goal state. They abandoned the task due to emotional distress.
